name: Final Nights 4: Fates Entwined
summary:
Final Nights 4: Fates Entwined is a point-and-click survival horror video game created by JeliLiam. being released on December 15, 2018. Being the fourth and the last entries of the Final Nights series, the story of the game happened both in 1973 and 2017, as the player can play as Henry Stillwater, the founder of Fredbear's Family Diner, and Max Donovan, a paranormal investigator who is trying to solve the mysteries of Henry's disappearance. 

The untold stories of Final Nights

In Final Nights 4 you will explore the original Fredbear's Family Diner and much more from 2 different perspectives.

In 1973

You will play as Henry Stillwater, the founder of Fredbear's and the man with a vision. Working together with Afton Robotics to make a restaurant that the whole family can enjoy. Sadly your night-guard quit without any rhyme or reason, he just failed to show up one day. So until you find a replacement you take the job yourself. It's only then you start seeing the truth of what the man behind the robots has been doing.

In 2017

You play Max Donovan, a paranormal investigator who's gotten an anonymous tip about the sudden disappearance of Henry Stillwater. You go to the abandoned Fredbear's location to try and find the truth, not knowing something restless is out there, and it wants to show you the truth of everything what happened, and to save them.
The origin story we never saw. Now in Final Nights 4!

With features like.

    Point and Click puzzle solving

    Classic FNaF gameplay

    SL Style Mini Nights

    Graphics powered by Unreal Engine 4

    Unique Soundtrack

    The origin story to the Final Nights lore
    Multiple endings

And much more!
